[[File:The Lord of the Rings Online - Andrath.jpg|thumb|250px|Andrath in ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]'']]
The '''Andrath''' was a defile between the [[Barrow-downs]] (to the west) and the [[South Downs]] (to the east) in [[Eriador]].  Through this narrow way just south of [[Bree]] passed the [[North-South Road]] ([[Greenway]]).<ref name="Ind">{{UT|Index}}</ref>

==History==
When the [[Nazgûl|Black Riders]] came up the Greenway in search of the [[The One Ring|One Ring]], the [[Witch-king|Black Captain]] established a camp at Andrath.  From there he sent some Riders out to patrol while he visited the Barrow-downs.<ref>{{UT|Hunt}}</ref>

==Etymology==
''Andrath'' means "Long Climb",<ref name="Ind"/> apparently consisting of the [[Sindarin]] elements ''[[and]]'' + ''[[rath#Sindarin|rath]]''.<ref>[http://www.tolkiendil.com/langues/english/i-lam_arth/compound_sindarin_names Compound Sindarin Names in Middle-earth] at [http://www.tolkiendil.com Tolkiendil.com] (accessed 20 July 2011)</ref>

== Portrayal in adaptations ==
'''2007: ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]'':'''
:Andrath is a prominent area within [[Bree-land]] and contains the prominent "Halecatch Lake". The "South-guard Ruins" on the [[Greenway]] divide into norther and southern Andrath, the latter belonging to the in-game [[Cardolan]] region.
